# init(url:)

**Initializer**

Initializes an auxiliary storage object with data from the location at the URL you provide.

## Declaration

```swift
init(url URL: URL)
```

## Parameters

- **URL**: The URL of the auxiliary storage on the local file system.

## Creating the auxiliary storage

- **init(contentsOfURL:)**: Initializes an auxiliary storage object with data from the location at the URL you provide.
- **init(creatingStorageAt:hardwareModel:options:)**: Creates an initialized Mac auxiliary storage instance that describes a specific hardware model at a URL you specify.
- **VZMacAuxiliaryStorage.InitializationOptions**: Options you can set when creating new auxiliary storage.
